archived.description: Whether to return only results that have been archived.
archived.name: archived

idProperty.description: The name of a property whose values are unique for this object type
idProperty.name: idProperty

objectType.description: The object type to work with
objectType.name: objectType

after.description: The paging cursor token of the last successfully read resource will be returned as the paging.next.after JSON property of a paged response containing more results.
after.name: after

associations.description: A comma separated list of object types to retrieve associated IDs for. If any of the specified associations do not exist, they will be ignored.
associations.name: associations

limit.description: The maximum number of results to display per page.
limit.name: limit

properties.description: A comma separated list of the properties to be returned in the response. If any of the specified properties are not present on the requested object(s), they will be ignored.
properties.name: properties

post.description: Filter, sort, and search CRM objects

put.description:
Associate objects using the V1 API
https://legacydocs.hubspot.com/docs/methods/crm-associations/associate-objects

post.description: Creates an object of the given type

200.description: An object with the id and properties of the created object
An object with a result array of objects and paging instructions

patch.description: Updates the object of the given type and the given id

200.description: An object with the id and properties of the created object

get.description:
Read an Object identified by {objectId}. {objectId} refers
to the internal object ID by default, or optionally any unique property
value as specified by the idProperty query param.
Control what is returned via the properties query param.
